## Activate JavaScript

**URL**: https://docs.hetzner.com/robot

**Contents**:
    - Robot

Robot is Hetzner's administration panel for Dedicated Root Servers, Colocation, Storage Boxes, and domains (via the Domain Registration Robot add-on).
